name: Spellstorm
description:
Spellstorm combines falling-block action with vertical match-3 gameplay! Make matches to boost crystalized mana off the screen and into your manapool! Don't worry if you don't quite clear it -- match again and the crystals will soar even higher!

Once you're full of energy, give no quarter -- launch attacks against your enemy to ultimately defeat them in wizardly combat.

Heavily inspired by Meteos, but hopefully with a unique twist!
